TER.TERdecoder.ReadFile
Class ReadRecommendedHeader

java.lang.Object
  TER.TERdecoder.ReadFile.ReadRecommendedHeader

public class ReadRecommendedHeader
extends java.lang.Object

This class receives a bit stream from which reads the header (compilant with the CCSDS recomendation for image data coding).
Usage example:
  construct
  set parameters
  run
  get functions

Version:
1.2
Author:
Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

Field Detail

header

ReadBufferedStream header
It is expected that the bit stream contains a header according the recommendation of CCSDS for image data coding.

boolean parametersSet
To know if parameters are set.

True indicates that they are set otherwise false.

int segmentCount
Segment counter value.

Valid values are integers between 1 and 256 encoded mod(256)

startImgFlag

int startImgFlag
Flags initial segment in an image (component)

Valid values are:

  • 0 - continuation segment in image
  • 1 - first segment in image

endImgFlag

int endImgFlag
Flags final segment in an image (component)

Valid values are:

  • 0 - not the last segment in image
  • 1 - last segment in image

Constructor Detail

ReadRecommendedHeader

public ReadRecommendedHeader()
Constructor of ReadRecommendedHeader. It does not receive anything.

Method Detail

setParameters

public void setParameters(ReadBufferedStream header)
Set the parameters needed used to read the header, in this case, it is only necessary the bit stream containing the encoded image.

Parameters:
header - definition in header

run

public int run()
        throws java.lang.Exception
Read the header contained in the bit stream and store the data required for decoding purposes

Returns:
an integer containing the size in bytes of the header
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - when the parameters are not set, the data in the bit stream is not compilant with CCSDS recommendation or the data in the bit stream cannot be read.

private void readHeaderPart1A()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Read the part 1A of the header

Throws:
